title: Battlefield 1 headlines Xbox Games With Gold for November 2018 | Trusted Reviews
description:
![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Microsoft has announced the free Games With Gold coming to[Xbox
One](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/xbox-one-x) and Xbox 360 owners in
November, and this month is a doozy.**

EA and DICE’s World War I shooter Battlefield 1 headlines the four titles,
which includes two Xbox One games and two Xbox 360 games, all of which can be
played on the Xbox One via Backwards Compatibility.

Battlefield 1, which is widely regarded among the best FPS games of this or
any other generation, will be free to download for Xbox One subscribers from
November 1 until November 30.

The game earned a [9/10 rating from Trusted
Reviews](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/battlefield-1), in which our
reviewer praised the “superlative campaign experience” and the best “single-
player war experience in over a decade.”

**Related:[Best Xbox One games](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/xbox-one-
games-3435271)**

Elsewhere, the Xbox One game Race The Sun will be available to download from
November 16 until December 15. In a [blog post](https://news.xbox.com/en-
us/2018/10/30/games-with-gold-november-2018/) on Tuesday, Microsoft says the
game is inspired “by arcade games of the past, short games sessions are mixed
with nerve-wracking tension and pure fun as you hurtle your solar-powered
craft at breakneck speeds in a race against time. The rules are simple: Don’t
crash, stay in the light, and don’t slow down!”

On the Xbox 360 side of things, owners of both consoles will be able to play
the original Assassin’s Creed (Nov 1-15), as well as Dante’s Inferno (Nov
16-30).

Of the latter, Microsoft says: “Begin your epic quest of vengeance and
redemption in Dante’s Inferno. Based on the classic poem, rescue the soul of
your beloved Beatrice from the Nine Circles of Hell in this fast-paced action
title. To succeed, you’ll need to confront fierce monsters, hideous demons,
and your own personal sins.”

Microsoft dishes out a number of free games every month to reward subscribers
to its Xbox Live Gold online service. As long as gamers maintain their
subscription, the games will always be available to them.

**Is this the best Games With Gold line-up in a while? Share your favourites
